verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be an apostle, <S%G652><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
(Which <S%G3739><s%> he had promised afore <S%G4279><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G848><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Scriptures,) <S%G1124><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh; <S%G4561><s%>

And declared <S%G3724><s%> to be the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of holiness, <S%G42><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> from the dead: <S%G3498><s%>

By <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have received <S%G2983><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> apostleship, <S%G651><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> to the faith <S%G4102><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G848><s%> name; <S%G3686><s%>
Among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the called <S%G2822><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To all <S%G3956><s%> that be <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints: <S%G40><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

First, <S%G4412><s%> I <S%G3303><s%> thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is spoken of <S%G2605><s%> <S%G1722><s%> throughout the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> that <S%G5613><s%> without ceasing <S%G89><s%> I make <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

Making request, <S%G1189><s%> if by any means <S%G1513><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at length <S%G4218><s%> I might have a prosperous journey <S%G2137><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I long <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may impart <S%G3330><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> gift, <S%G5486><s%> to the end ye <S%G5209><s%> may be established; <S%G4741><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> That <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> that I may be comforted together <S%G4837><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mutual <S%G1722><s%> <S%G240><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have you ignorant, <S%G50><s%> <S%G5209><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> oftentimes <S%G4178><s%> I purposed <S%G4388><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> (but <S%G2532><s%> was let <S%G2967><s%> hitherto,) <S%G891><s%> <S%G1204><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might have <S%G2192><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> debtor <S%G3781><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Barbarians; <S%G915><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the wise, <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the unwise. <S%G453><s%>

So, <S%G3779><s%> as much as in me is, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1691><s%> I am ready <S%G4289><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are at <S%G1722><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I am not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> to every one <S%G3956><s%> that believeth; <S%G4100><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> also <S%G5037><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> is the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written. <S%G1125><s%> <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> just <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is revealed <S%G601><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> who hold <S%G2722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unrighteousness; <S%G93><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> that which may be known <S%G1110><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath showed <S%G5319><s%> it unto them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> invisible things <S%G517><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> are clearly seen, <S%G2529><s%> being understood <S%G3539><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> things that are <S%G4161><s%> made, even <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3739><s%> his <S%G848><s%> eternal <S%G126><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Godhead; <S%G2305><s%> so that they <S%G846><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> without excuse: <S%G379><s%>

Because that, <S%G1360><s%> when they knew <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> him not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G2228><s%> were thankful; <S%G2168><s%> but <S%G235><s%> became vain <S%G3154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G848><s%> imaginations, <S%G1261><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> foolish <S%G801><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> was darkened. <S%G4654><s%>
Professing <S%G5335><s%> themselves to be <S%G1511><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%> they became fools, <S%G3471><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> changed <S%G236><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> incorruptible <S%G862><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> an image <S%G1504><s%> made like to <S%G3667><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to birds, <S%G4071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fourfooted beasts, <S%G5074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things. <S%G2062><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gave them up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> of their own <S%G848><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to dishonor <S%G818><s%> their own <S%G848><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> between <S%G1722><s%> themselves: <S%G1438><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> changed <S%G3337><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> a lie, <S%G5579><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4573><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G3000><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> more than <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Creator, <S%G2936><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

For this cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave them up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> vile <S%G819><s%> affections: <S%G3806><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> even <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3739><s%> their <S%G848><s%> women <S%G2338><s%> did change <S%G3337><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> which is against <S%G3844><s%> nature: <S%G5449><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> men, <S%G730><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> natural <S%G5446><s%> use <S%G5540><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> woman, <S%G2338><s%> burned <S%G1572><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G848><s%> lust <S%G3715><s%> one toward another; <S%G240><s%> <S%G1519><s%> men <S%G730><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G730><s%> working <S%G2716><s%> that which is unseemly, <S%G808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G618><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> that recompense <S%G489><s%> of their <S%G848><s%> error <S%G4106><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was meet. <S%G1163><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> they did not <S%G3756><s%> like <S%G1381><s%> to retain <S%G2192><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their knowledge, <S%G1922><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave them over <S%G3860><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a reprobate <S%G96><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> those things which are not convenient; <S%G2520><s%> <S%G3361><s%>

Being filled <S%G4137><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> fornication, <S%G4202><s%> wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> maliciousness; <S%G2549><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of envy, <S%G5355><s%> murder, <S%G5408><s%> debate, <S%G2054><s%> deceit, <S%G1388><s%> malignity; <S%G2550><s%> whisperers, <S%G5588><s%>

Backbiters, <S%G2637><s%> haters of God, <S%G2319><s%> despiteful, <S%G5197><s%> proud, <S%G5244><s%> boasters, <S%G213><s%> inventors <S%G2182><s%> of evil things, <S%G2556><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%>
Without understanding, <S%G801><s%> covenant breakers, <S%G802><s%> without natural affection, <S%G794><s%> implacable, <S%G786><s%> unmerciful: <S%G415><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> knowing <S%G1921><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> judgment <S%G1345><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they which commit <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> have pleasure <S%G4909><s%> in them that do <S%G4238><s%> them.
